features: ✅𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐮𝐦 𝐌𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐬: Made from high-quality eco-friendly PVC material, meticulously handcrafted with lifelike design.

💘𝐏𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐒𝐞𝐭: Includes an exquisite gift box, 1 mask, 2 pairs of interchangeable eyes, 6-inch action model, 5 pairs of interchangeable hands, 4 webs, 1 large and stand, and a multi-joint transparent support.

🙈𝐂𝐨𝐨𝐥 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: Deep restoration of movie characters, with a metallic finish and packaged in a beautiful gift box. Fully articulated body allows for a variety of poseable positions. With its rugged and cool appearance, this collectible action figure is sure to be loved by both boys and girls.

🎁𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐆𝐢𝐟𝐭: An exceptional and exquisite collectible figurine, suitable for themed hotels, internet cafes, coffee shops, bookstores, offices, bedrooms, or living room decor. Packaged in a beautifully designed gift box, it makes a perfect gift for children, teenagers, and movie fans for themed birthdays, parties, and Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ad soon ad my son opened this for Christmas he tried to change the changeable hands and they BOTH broke off and now spiderman has no hands. This product is cheap made and none of the instructions are in English. Skip this one and buy something else. Not worth the price even if it was 10 bucks. Rip off.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Accurate product given from seller
reviews.reviewText: This product is perfect, lots of accessories and none of the parts break or fall of easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for kids.
reviews.reviewText: My son was so excited to get this, the first time he tried to change the hands the piece that you connect the different hands to broke off inside the hand. So now he has a handless spiderman. Why would you make the connecting piece that small and give that many hand options to switch it with? Not worth $50.

reviews.reviewerName: No me pasó el traking nunca lo pude importar .no contesto
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Port quality. None of the pieces fit together
reviews.reviewText: Please do not purchase this toy. This item is poorly made, (misshapen connectors), but horrible assembly components. The round ball-end joints to hold the variety of hands is very poorly made. Not a single one of the additional hand would attach, and after removing the original fitted hands those never fit back into placement either. A huge waste of money, and a disappointing experience for a child’s birthday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: One of my sons loves to order these type of toys that have a million pieces attached to it and usually one doesn’t fit or is broken but these fit great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Piece of garbage
reviews.reviewText: My son got this for Christmas and he tried to change the hand and it broke. Now you can't even have a hand on it. It's totally over priced for the quality of this. I would not recommend anyone buy this unless you just want to keep it in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Potentially unlicensed Spidey figure that is fun to play with
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent figure but a bit overpriced for what it is. My main issue is that there is no mention of Marvel anywhere on the packaging and it actually says SH Figuarts in several places despite not being a Figuarts product. There is poor paint throughout, the color of the plastic and paint change from piece to piece, and the figure feels frail in hand. Spidey is also undersized compared to most 1/12 scale figure lines so he'll seem small in most displays. That said, there are very few figures of Gamerverse Spider-man and the sculpt and articulation on this figure are miles better than what Hasbro put out for Marvel Legends. It includes a ton of accessories and is fun to play with. If you're looking for a fun figure of Gamerverse Spider-man to add to your shelf you could do worse.
